comments.comment: {{learner.forename}} is able to evaluate different sources of evidence, viewpoints and contributions to an argument in an intelligent process which leads to a logical and well-reasoned judgement.
{{learner.forename}} is able to evaluate sources of evidence, viewpoints and contributions to an argument with some confidence and work towards a logical and well-reasoned judgement.
{{learner.forename}} is able to evaluate sources of evidence and different points of view using a simple formula, and is learning to form a reasoned conclusion to a written argument.
